page.title: 14Education <School garden>
page.content: Broadwindsor school has a gardening club.I am a member of it.At lunch playtime members of the gardening club,go down to the garden to plant things and to get out weeds etc.Our garden is at the bottom of our school playground,behind our school swimming pool.Last year,which was 1984,the gardening club grew some potatoes,somecabbages,some spinach some carrots and one or two other things.We also grew some flowers.they where,some sweet peas and some other flowers.the sweet peas grew to about four metres tall.The school garden is about 12 metres in length and about 9 metres in width.The school gardening club is a thing that is open to class 3 only.There are two other clsses,class 1 and class 2,but they are not allowed to do it.
